channel.title: Endless encoder
channel.description: Hi all, For my current build project, based on matthewcieplac's xylobox - I am planning to use an endless rotary encoder to cycle through and select from a number of files (wave tables in this instance) on the sd card that may increase or decrease over time (to a max of 99). I am wondering if anyone has any experience with using endless encoders and axoloti. I tried searching these pages but didn't find much info. Are there specific types or brands that work better than others? Are there technical limitations to keep in mind? I am not looking to use it for expression, just as a selector.
